profile.about:
Currently studying M.Sc. in Data Science and Engineering at DAUIN, Polytechnic University of Turin. I did my B.Eng in Process Automation Engineering in Baku Higher Oil School.
I most enjoy solving problems that require my data modeling, analytics, and solution architecture expertise. Data Scientist professional with 5+ years of experience in programming and proven research and communication skills. Managed to have high scores >90%) in academic life. Looking for an opportunity in a dynamic organization where my skills will be fully utilized.
